Preferences Leanback Preferences Car Preferences
Basic attributes
Preference Simple preference with no special attributes
Very stylish preference Define style tags such as <b> in a string resource to customize a preference\'s text
Icon preference Define a drawable to display it at the start of the preference
Single line title preference - no matter how long the title is it will never wrap to multiple lines This title will be ellipsized instead of wrapping to another line
Widgets
Checkbox preference Tap anywhere in this preference to toggle state
Switch preference Tap anywhere in this preference to toggle state
Dropdown preference
Seekbar preference
Dialogs
EditText preference This title can be changed!
List preference Choose one option!
Multi-select list preference Shows a dialog with multiple choice options Choose some options!
Advanced attributes
Expandable preference group This group shows one item and collapses the rest into the advanced button below
Intent preference Launches an intent when pressed
Parent preference Toggling this preference will change the enabled state of the preference below
Child preference The enabled state of this preference is controlled by the preference above
Variable summary preference On! :) - the summary of this preference changes depending on its state Off! :( - the summary of this preference changes depending on its state
Copyable preference Long press on this preference to copy its summary Create An Adventure Invite Your Friends Feedback Your Adventures Add Adventure By QR Code Follow Adventure TODO

List
In Progress Completed Created Answer Hint #1 Hint #2 Hint #3 Optional Here is where you can create a \"Text\" based clue. A user\'s guess will need to match your expected answer (within reason) for the clue to be accepted. Clue Explore Where will you explore? When you uplaod an image our algorithm will show you what tags are associated with that image. These tags are what will be checked when someone attempts to solve your clue. Select the tags that best describe your subject. Take a new photo or select one from your existing photo library. Gallery Camera Take Picture Hint for your photo clue Recent Reviews • Upcoming Adventures Create the next adventure Whether it\'s a coffee crawl, haunted house walk, or cross-city amazing race, creating an adventure is a great way to share your interests with others and earn you some money doing it. All adventures that are selected to be featured will earn the creator a creation bonus as well as allow the creator to receive tips from adventurers who enjoyed your creation. Learn more > Where will you explore? Discover the origins of the Kraken There are whispers of its whereabouts... Hunt The Kraken Map Nearby Adventures Solve from home Who says you can\'t explore from the comfort of your own couch? These adventures are purely text-clue based and can be done where you are. Explore all Continue Next Choose a clue type Text Requires a solver to type the correct answer to the clue Photo Location Requires the solver to take a photo of the clue\'s solution Requires the solver to physically navigate to the correct location described in the clue Whatever Booty you set as a reward will be awarded to the first 5 finishers of your adventure. // Workshop strings Title and Information Photos Privacy Clues Tips and Treasure Review Preview Name your Adventure Be descriptive. Try to include the main subject of the adventure in the title and expand on it in the description. Title Description Photos Here you can add photos to help others see how awesome your adventure is.
Clues Here you can add the meat and potatoes of your adventure. Clues can be text clues, location clues, or photo clues. There are no clues yet. Add one! What will this clue be? Mix and match different clue types to create a unique and exciting adventure! Choose a clue type Clue prompt Clue solution Hints There are no hints yet. Add some!
Text Clue Editor Text clues consist of a clue promp, a solution, and some optional hints. e.g. This International Orange icon connects San Francisco and Marin County e.g. The Golden Gate Bridge
Photo Clue Editor Photo clues consist of a clue prompt, photos of the solution (a landmark, object, famous person, etc.), and some optional hints.
Location Clue Editor Photo clues consist of a clue prompt, a solution that is a physical (gps) location, and some optional hints. Choose on map
Tips and Treasure What\'s a treasure hunt without treasure? Here you can determine the size of the spoils for the winners as well as allow users to tip you for an adventure well devised. Privacy Controls All adventures created are public by default. A premium account is required to make a private adventure.
